(I GTG. Cya all tomorrow.)

::KitKat::

She was thrilled and overjoyed that she would be able to have an arm 
again.  Then she could fight and defend her group.  She was  afighter 
and couldn't think of a life without fighting.

She looked at Terrorsaur. "What do we do now? Quickstrike and 
Darkmouse are gone.  We are still short handed, what do we do if the 
other preds attack us.  We'd be outnumbered 3 to 1.  I don't like 
those odds."

She was mad at Megatron for sending them into a death trap like 
that.  She wondered what was going on in Megatron's mind.  Was he 
crazy? Had his logic circiuts gone haywire?  She couldn't help but 
wonder.
